Publication Title: DIET: Conditional independence testing with marginal dependence measures of residual information
Publication Authors: Mukund Sudarshan, Aahlad Puli, Wesley Tansey, Rajesh Ranganath
Publication Abstract: Conditional randomization tests (CRTs) assess whether a variable x is predictive of another variable y, having observed covariates z. CRTs require fitting a large number of predictive models, which is often computationally intractable.
